How to: troubleshoot shiny.react apps

Source: vignettes/sz-how-to-troubleshoot.Rmd
sz-how-to-troubleshoot.Rmd
  • Enable debug mode with shiny.react::enableReactDebugMode().
  • Check for errors in the browser console.
